name: OpenPollingApp

args.name: options
args.desc: A list of options for the poll. This list should not contain duplicate entries.

args.name: can_resubmit
args.desc: Whether this poll allows accounts to change their submissions or not.

methods.name: open
methods.desc:
Marks this poll as open.
This will fail if the poll is already open.
The poll must be open in order to receive user input.

methods.name: close
methods.desc:
Marks this poll as closed.
This will fail if the poll is already closed.

methods.name: submit

args.name: choice
args.desc: The choice made by the sender. This must be an index into the options for this poll.

methods.desc:
Submit a response to the poll.
Submissions can only be received if the poll is open. If the poll is closed, this will fail.
If a submission has already been made by the sender and the poll allows resubmissions, the sender's choice will be updated to the most recent submission. If the poll does not allow resubmissions, this action will fail.

methods.name: status

returns.desc: A tuple containing the following information, in order: whether the poll allows resubmission, whether the poll is open, and an array of the poll's current results. This array contains one entry per option, and each entry is a tuple of that option's value and the number of accounts who have voted for it.

methods.desc: Get the status of this poll.

desc: A polling application with no restrictions on who can participate.
